description:
A deluxe ride for your herd of 2-wheeled steeds. This burly tailgate pad is built for hauling your crew's rides up gravel spitting backroads in search of the best trails. Tough materials and extra padding is equally kind to your truck.

  • Vinyl coated nylon resists abrasions and water
  • Soft felt backing protects your truck's paint
  • G-Hook tension systems is compatible with carbon frames
  • Reinforced webbing holds pad secure
  • Cable-lock loop lets you use your own cable lock to secure your pad and bikes
  • HindSight™ fold-away flap for rear camera
  • Size medium fits 135-155cm wide tailgates and holds up to 5 bikes
  • Size large fits 158cm and wider tailgates and holds up to 6 bikes
name: Yakima Gatekeeper Tailgate Pad
